document_data.name: Glade of Life
document_data.mainbody: The '''Glade of Life''' was a sacred place of worship for followers of [[Shiallia]], [[Chauntea]], [[Eldath]], [[Lurue]], and [[Mielikki]].
document_data.Location: The Glade of Life was located within the [[High Forest]] of [[northwest Faerûn]] near the [[aarakocra]] village of [[Khle'cayre]] at the base of the [[Star Mounts]].
document_data.Description: Massive [[oak]] trees well over a thousand years old surrounded the glade. The [[Unicorn Run]] flowed through the glade, sprouting from the [[Fountain of Unicorns]] found near its center. A unique fey beauty encompassed the glade that was found nowhere else in the Realms.
document_data.Activities: [[Korred]]s and other magical creatures danced within the glade on a nightly basis. [[Avatar]]s of the four goddesses of the glade had been known to join the korred from time to time.
document_data.Inhabitants: Many of Shiallia's clergy occupied the glade before leaving to wander the High Forest. Only an ancient korred known as the [[Dancer of Life]] remained at all times.
